pack.imm.hover_event: Click here to open the Immunology Wiki
commands.imm.wrong_version: You are using Immunology on the incorrect Minecraft version. You should be using Minecraft 1.20.4.
chat.imm.wiki.hover_event: Click here to open the Immunology Wiki
chat.imm.gamerules.title: Immunology Gamerules
chat.imm.gamerules.dosyphonsickness.desc: Toggle whether to allow for the spread of Syphon Sickness
chat.imm.gamerules.dotransmogrism.descri: Toggle whether to allow for the spread of Transmogrism
chat.imm.gamerules.dostentch.description: Toggle whether to allow for the spread of stentch
chat.imm.gamerules.doblight.description: Toggle whether to allow for the spread of Blight
chat.imm.gamerules.domar.description: Toggle whether to allow for the spread of Mar
chat.imm.gamerules.mobscontractblight.de: Toggle whether Mobs can carry Blight
chat.imm.gamerules.spawnstentch.descript: Toggle whether Zombies can spawn with Stentch
chat.imm.gamerules.spawnvampire.descript: Toggle whether Vampires replace various Mobs
chat.imm.gamerules.spawnbasidia.descript: Toggle whether Basidia spawn around Players
death.attack.imm.shapeshift: %1$s shapeshifted their insides into their outsides
death.attack.imm.shapeshift.player: %1$s shapeshifted their insides into their outsides whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.imm.vomit.player: %1$s vomited up their guts whilst trying to escape %2$s
disease.imm.blight.drank_milk: You feel strange after consuming the Milk
disease.imm.blight.consume_wrong_suspici: You feel strange after consuming the Stew
disease.imm.blight.consume_correct_suspi: You feel better after consuming the Stew
advancements.imm.immunology.root.title: Immunology
advancements.imm.immunology.root.descrip: The study of Disease and its various cures
advancements.imm.immunology.wear_plague_: Obtain and equip a Plague Mask to protect yourself from Disease
advancements.imm.immunology.obtain_fleam: Obtain a Fleam, used to cure living things of Diseases
Use a Fleam to cure another Player of Disease
advancements.imm.immunology.be_cured.des: Be cured of a Disease by another Player
advancements.imm.immunology.cure_mob_of_: Cure a Villager or Piglin of Blight
advancements.imm.immunology.starve_sypho: Starve out and promptly vomit a parasite
advancements.imm.immunology.vomit_syphon: I Brought You Into This World—
—I Will Take You Out Of It
Slay a Syphon before it can escape to reproduce
advancements.imm.immunology.place_syphon: Place a Basidia, but be careful not to contract Syphon Sickness
advancements.imm.immunology.blight_sneez: Sneeze for the first time after contracting Blight
Cure yourself of Blight by consuming the correct Suspicious Stew
advancements.imm.immunology.drink_milk_w: Inadvertently worsen your Blight by consuming a Milk Bucket
advancements.imm.immunology.cure_mar.des: Use a Decorated Pot to cure yourself of Mar
advancements.imm.immunology.spirits_hurt: Be on the recieving end of a spirits attack
advancements.imm.immunology.shatter_tool: Shatter a tool while infected with Mar
advancements.imm.immunology.obtain_ectop: Obtain a piece of Ectoplasm to save your tools
advancements.imm.immunology.contract_ste: Be attacked by a foul-smelling Zombie
advancements.imm.immunology.vomit_food.d: Attempt to eat the same food twice while infected with Stench
advancements.imm.immunology.consume_all_: Exhaust all of your food options while infected with Stench
advancements.imm.immunology.agro_iron_go: Take a hit from an Iron Golem while infected with Stench
advancements.imm.immunology.cure_illness: Cure yourself of illness by consuming an Enchanted Golden Apple
advancements.imm.immunology.bloodlet_ich: Bloodlet an individual with Golden Blood
advancements.imm.immunology.have_all_dis: Contract all Diseases at the same time
